daxEqualizer.title: DAX Audio Equalizer
daxEqualizer.description: Adjust Dolby Audio Processing (DAX) equalizer settings to optimize audio experience. Supports simple and advanced modes with various presets and custom adjustment features.
daxEqualizer.resetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset the current equalizer settings? All unsaved changes will be lost.
daxEqualizer.saveMessage: Are you sure you want to save the current equalizer settings? This will modify the system configuration file.
daxEqualizer.restoreMessage: Please enter the full path to the backup file:
daxEqualizer.helpSimple: Simple mode provides a 10-band equalizer with range from -12dB to +12dB. Includes various music style presets suitable for most users.
daxEqualizer.helpContent1: Intelligent Equalizer (IEQ): Uses target values to adjust audio frequency response, ranging from -1000 to 1000. Positive values enhance frequencies, negative values attenuate them.
daxEqualizer.helpContent2: Graphic Equalizer (GEQ): Directly adjusts frequency bands using gain values, ranging from -12dB to +12dB.
daxEqualizer.helpContent3: It's recommended to backup the original configuration before making changes. After modification, you need to restart the audio service or reboot the device for changes to take effect.
